file.name: issue1169-noSplit.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Sample title
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /
paths:
  /path_{p0}/{p1}{p2}/another-{p3}:
    put:
      parameters:
        - name: p0
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: p1
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: p2
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: p3
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: sample desc
          content: {}
components: {}

Error: buildRouter: build router: add route "/path_{p0}/{p1}{p2}/another-{p3}" (op "PathP0P1P2AnotherP3Put"): can't handle two parameters in a row ("p1" and "p2")
